Package org.skistation.controllers

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.controllers.ClientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/clients") public class ClientController extends Object
Controller for managing clients. It is responsible for handling requests related to clients.

    Constructs a new ClientController with the specified client service.

  • Method Details

    • getClients

      @GetMapping("") public List<Client> getClients()
      Gets all clients.
      Returns:
      a list of all clients.

    • findClientById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Client findClientById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Finds a client by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the client.
      Returns:
      the client with the specified ID.

    • findClientByEmail

      @GetMapping("/{email}") public Client findClientByEmail(@PathVariable("email") String email)
      Finds a client by email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the client.
      Returns:
      the client with the specified email.

    • findClientByPhoneNumber

      @GetMapping("/{phone}") public Client findClientByPhoneNumber(@PathVariable("phone") Integer phoneNumber)
      Finds a client by phone number.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the client.
      Returns:
      the client with the specified phone number.

    • addClient

      @PostMapping("/addClient") public String addClient(@RequestBody Client client)
      Adds a new client.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to add.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the clients page.

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editClient/{clientId}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable Integer clientId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows the edit form for a client.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the ID of the client to edit.
      model - the model to add attributes to.
      Returns:
      the name of the view for the edit form.

    • saveEditedClient

      @PostMapping("/editClient/save") public String saveEditedClient(@ModelAttribute("client") Client editedClient, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Saves an edited client.
      Parameters:
      editedClient - the edited client.
      result - the result of the binding.
      model - the model to add attributes to.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the clients page.

    • deleteClient

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteClient/{id}") public String deleteClient(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a client.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the client to delete.
      model - the model to add attributes to.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the clients page.
